Riyadh â€“ Al Ula
Discover the vibrant capital of Riyadh, blending rich history with modern landmarks. Then, journey to AlUla, where ancient heritage meets stunning desert landscapes, including the iconic Maraya and breathtaking rock formations.

Inclusions
Transportation
Bus in Riyadh
4WD in AlUla (4 pax per car)
Accommodation on B.B basis as per below.
Tour guides (English speaking) in Riyadh
Local driver (basic English speaking) in AlUla
Museum & sites entrance fee
Meals (2 lunch + 3 dinners)
Snacks & refreshments

Exclusion
International Flight Tickets
Any additional tours, activities, or upgrades not included in the package
Personal Expenses
Tipping
